title: Groups Problem
body: I was the leader of a group that I created and after the group updates I can no longer see the group as existing. I still have friends in it and they say that I'm still in the group and marked as the leader of it. Any help would be great, thanks!

replies.body: There were some club issues after a recent [downtime](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016), but most of these issues should be resolved at this point.  I took a look at your account and see that you are in two clubs and everything looks okay.  I did poke at it a bit to make sure.  Let me know if this is still an issue (and which club) after relogging first!

[Pic1](https://images-2.discordapp.net/.eJwNyFEOgyAMANC7cABqi8zG2xAkaKaU0Jp9mN19e5_vcfc43ep2s64rwHZolrF5NRmpFl9F6llSP9RnuSCZpbxfpZkCUggYlnnCV-SJkRhoZqLwH1qQOTJFuNu7yaf53qr7_gAEGSLL.Se1X3uzcux3dNSk1wPCj0jdG1yE)
[Pic2](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/123313740165808128/248224250136100864/Screen_Shot_2016-11-15_at_3.13.13_PM.png)
These are two pictures that show the issues that I've been having. The first one is of my client club screen, I can't see the Krispitaria club at all. The second one is of my friends client and it shows the Krispitaria club and me in the list of the members and the leader of the club too. I don't know why, but it happened after the downtime for the clubs.
There were some issues with clubs when they reactivated after that downtime.  I looked into your club, and everything looks fine now!
